Posted By: SAUS3 (6/7/2013 12:27:21 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
While no one may really use Golgari in standard, at least from my experience, I realise that running a deck with this and [Golgari Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Golgari Charm) equals: anti-enchanment, anti-artifact, anti-boardwipe, anti-weenies and anti-regenerate. That's a lot of versatility from only two cards, and saves space from your sideboard.  
  
All in all, lovely to see a reprint of a simple Golgari removal spell.
posts.html:
While no one may really use Golgari in standard, at least from my experience, I realise that running a deck with this and Golgari Charm equals: anti-enchanment, anti-artifact, anti-boardwipe, anti-weenies and anti-regenerate. That's a lot of versatility from only two cards, and saves space from your sideboard.

All in all, lovely to see a reprint of a simple Golgari removal spell.
